      • getLogs

        @PostMapping(value="/{accountNo}")
public ApiResponse getLogs(@RequestBody
                                                              LogRequest logRequest,
                                                              @PathVariable
                                                              java.lang.String accountNo)
        Reprieves all transaction logs for specific account
        Parameters:
        logRequest - - log request (start time - end time - order(asc/desc)- transaction)
